NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Your MyDonate page is now ready
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on completing the first weekend of the RCA. This Saturday or Sunday you'll be getting stuck in completing the '100 Challenge Challenge' around Bromley to raise money for your partner charities. You have all set ambitious targets so remember to share your MyDonate page on Facebook, tweet the link on Twitter, write it in a letter, shout it from your rooftop... Ask everyone you know to sponsor you!!

Remember, your charities need the money you are raising to continue the great work they are doing in the community.
